Khal Drogo Will Likely Return To 'Game Of Thrones' S8 & This Ardent Fan Has Figured Out How!
Do you remember Khal Drogo? He married the Mother of Dragons Daenerys Targaryen long before we even knew that she would make a reigning queen.
Warning: There are spoilers ahead! Don't blame us later.
Twitter

Jason Momoa’s character had bid adieu to the show long ago in the show, but fans still miss him. Remember when Emilia Clarke & Jason Momoa had a mini reunion, fans went gaga over their picture on the Iron Throne. They demanded he should make a comeback on the show, and looks like he will.
Also Read: Emilia Clarke & Jason Momoa Had A Super Fun ‘Game Of Thrones’ Reunion & Fans Are Convinced Khal Drogo Is Coming Back
Well, an ardent fan of Game of Thrones has just cracked it how. In a Reddit post, the man with username u/cadiacman said that every character who has been burned to death would make a comeback in the same way as the White Walkers did. The Red God that the Red Priestess Melisandre keeps talking about will help the dead come back.
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 842 SHARES
“All characters that have been burned to death/after death by fire will be reincarnated by R'hllor (god of fire/light/red god). You fight an army with an army, an army of burned dead people that you resurrect,” he wrote.

In May this year, Jason Momoa had posted a picture with the writers of Game Of Thrones. Is he hinting on a comeback in the caption?

Fans are freaking out! Game Of Thrones season 8 will air in April 2019. It’s hard to curb the curiosity until then, right?
